Title: Relates to the reimbursement of out-of-network providers of clinical laboratory services
Summary: Relates to the reimbursement of out-of-network providers of clinical laboratory services by organizations providing or offering comprehensive health services plans.
LawCode: Amd ยง4406, Pub Health L; amd ยง4804, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to the reimbursement of out-of-network providers of clinical laboratory services by organizations providing or offering comprehensive health services plans
